attributes.action: launch a full public enquiry into the global financial crisis. As part of its remit, this enquiry should also investigate potential criminal activity by speculators, financiers and senior bankers in the build up to and during the crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unite is the trade union which represents employees in the financial services industry. The financial turmoil which has gripped the world has brought insecurity to staff in the UK and damaged the reputation of the vital sector of the economy. It is essential that there is a full public enquiry into the financial crisis. The role of speculators, financiers and senior bankers in the build up to and during the crisis must be established. The current situation provides an opportunity to re-build a financial system that supports a long-term outlook and is consistent with democratic aims, financial stability and social justice.
